message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, we propose a price of $950,000 for this exceptional opportunity.
Dear Alice, thank you for the offer. I recognize the value of the product, but I believe the proposed price is a bit high for my budget. I'd be willing to purchase it for $650,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. Considering the value it brings and your budget constraints, we are willing to negotiate further. We propose a price of $750,000 for the product.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on this.  $750,000 is closer, but I need to be mindful of my budget. How about we meet in the middle at $700,000?
Bob, thank you for your continued interest in our product. We understand your financial considerations and are willing to offer the product at $725,000. This is our final offer in this negotiation.
